lead_paragraph: Former Baylor standout Isaiah Austin has been cleared to play basketball again, 2 1/2 years after he was diagnosed with Marfan syndrome during a physical before the NBA draft.

headline.print_headline: Isaiah Austin Cleared to Play 2 Years After Marfan Diagnosis
headline.main: Isaiah Austin Cleared to Play 2 Years After Marfan Diagnosis

snippet: Former Baylor standout Isaiah Austin has been cleared to play basketball again, 2 1/2 years after he was diagnosed with Marfan syndrome during a physical before the NBA draft....
